name: mcp-solver-mzn_clear_model
description: Remove all items from the minizinc model, effectively resetting it.

name: mcp-solver-mzn_add_item
description: Add new minizinc item to the model at a specific index (indices start at 0). Required parameters: 'index' and 'content'.

name: mcp-solver-mzn_replace_item
description: Replace an existing item in the minizinc model at a specified index with new content. Required parameters: 'index' and 'content'.

name: mcp-solver-mzn_delete_item
description: Delete an item from the minizinc model at the specified index. Required parameter: 'index'.

name: mcp-solver-mzn_get_model
description: Fetch the current content of the minizinc model, listing each item with its index.

name: mcp-solver-mzn_solve_model
description: Solve the current minizinc model with a timeout parameter. Required parameter: 'timeout'.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_clear_model
description: Remove all items from the PySAT Python model, effectively resetting it.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_add_item
description: Add new Python code to the PySAT model at a specific index (indices start at 0). Required parameters: 'index' and 'content'.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_replace_item
description: Replace an existing item in the PySAT Python model at a specified index with new content. Required parameters: 'index' and 'content'.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_delete_item
description: Delete an item from the PySAT Python model at the specified index. Required parameter: 'index'.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_get_model
description: Fetch the current content of the PySAT Python model, listing each item with its index.

name: mcp-solver-pysat_solve_model
description: Solve the current PySAT Python model with a timeout parameter. Required parameter: 'timeout'.
